Posts.Content:
Hi, Today I got diagnosed stage IV breast cancer.  I was diagnosed with cancer on Feb. 4.  I had a CT Scan and a bone scan.  The bone scan was fine, the CT scan showed three small spots on the liver. My doctor said it was nothing to worry about
, but we will get a PET Scan anyway.
Posts.Title: Diagnosed Stage IV today

Posts.Content:
Thank you for replying! I didnt know you could go down in stages. That is a relief to hear. Thank goodness.
I have a wonderful family and good friends. I am very lucky. I feel better today, not so much like I got punched in the gut.
I am scared, but I will make it. 
I died my hair pink today and it made me happy. Made my daughter and step daughters happy too!
Please let me know how you are doing. Keep in touch.
God bless!
Posts.Title: Diagnosed Stage IV today

Posts.Content: I am doing my first chemo right now! Feeling good!
Posts.Title: Diagnosed Stage IV today
